metadata.description: A collection of useful Claude Code plugins by kawaz

plugins.name: force-japanese
plugins.description: Forces Claude Code to use Japanese language even after SessionStart:compact resets

plugins.name: force-bun
plugins.description: Suggests using Bun instead of npm/npx commands in Bash tool calls

plugins.name: force-uv
plugins.description: Suggests using UV instead of pip/pipx/venv commands in Bash tool calls

plugins.name: hooks-debugger
plugins.description: Logs all hook events to JSONL files for debugging purposes
